Text:
It looks like some tracks from CD1 have errors

For example: 
Track 3. (1.15-1.23 sample other song mixed in)
Track 11. (1.05-1.20 loop and different sound/speed)
Track 18. (2.49-2.59 sample other song mixed in)
Track 23. (2.19-2.29 sample other song mixed in)


Also track 4. on CD 1 is double in file

Quality of the rest is good.

Yes I encountered the same problem :( Hope there will be a proper.
Thanks for uploading though.
